snippet: Christopher Froome extended his overall lead in the Tour of Oman after holding off Alberto Contador and Joaquim Rodríguez Oliver to win the fifth stage.
abstract: Christopher Froome wins fifth stage of Tour of Oman bicycle race.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Froome extended his overall lead in the Tour of Oman after holding off Alberto Contador and Joaquim Rodríguez Oliver to win the fifth stage.

headline.seo: Christopher Froome Closes In on Tour of Oman Victory
headline.main: Froome Closes In on Tour of Oman Victory
